title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, it is expected that the item would disappear in the generated PDF. However, currently, the item remains visible even after setting the display property to 'none'.
OB: The label is not disappearing in the generated PDF.
EB: The label should disappear in the generated PDF.
SR:
1. Open the PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Generate the PDF.
4. Observe that the label of the item is still visible in the generated PDF.
